title: How do I turn off the beauty mode on the camera?
answer:
For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3, select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=86966) in the camera options bar and switch to another photo mode. 

 For EMUI 3.0, swipe left or right to switch to another photo mode in the camera app.
keywords: disable, take photos, photo, camera, beauty skin, beauty face, mode
